net.bytebuddy.implementation

类 MethodCall.TargetHandler.ForField

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.bytebuddy.implementation.MethodCall.TargetHandler.ForField
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    InstrumentedType.Prepareable, MethodCall.TargetHandler
    封闭接口:
    MethodCall.TargetHandler

    public static class MethodCall.TargetHandler.ForField
extends Object
implements MethodCall.TargetHandler
    Creates a target handler that stores the instance to invoke a method on in an instance field.

    • 嵌套类概要

      • 从接口继承的嵌套类/接口 net.bytebuddy.implementation.MethodCall.TargetHandler

      • ForField

        protected ForField(String name,
                   FieldLocator.Factory fieldLocatorFactory)
        Creates a new target handler for storing a method invocation target in an instance field.
        参数:
        name - The name of the field.
        fieldLocatorFactory - The field locator factory to use.

    • 方法详细资料

      • resolve

        public StackManipulation resolve(MethodDescription invokedMethod,
                                 MethodDescription instrumentedMethod,
                                 TypeDescription instrumentedType,
                                 Assigner assigner,
                                 Assigner.Typing typing)
        从接口复制的说明: MethodCall.TargetHandler
        Creates a stack manipulation that represents the method's invocation.
        指定者:
        resolve 在接口中 MethodCall.TargetHandler
        参数:
        invokedMethod - The method to be invoked.
        instrumentedMethod - The instrumented method.
        instrumentedType - The instrumented type. @return A stack manipulation that invokes the method.
        assigner - The assigner to use.
        typing - The typing to apply.
        返回:
        A stack manipulation that loads the method target onto the operand stack.
